org.arl.fjage.rmi

Class SlaveContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arl.fjage.Container
      • org.arl.fjage.rmi.SlaveContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, RemoteContainer

    public class SlaveContainer
extends Container
implements RemoteContainer
    Slave container attached to a master container. Agents in linked master and slave containers function as if they were in the same container, i.e., are able to communicate with each other through messaging, topics and directory services.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.arl.fjage.Container
